DOC.brief_summary: Lurasidone HCl compound develop treatment schizophrenia . This clinical study design test hypothesis lurasidone effective , tolerable , safe compare quetiapine XR long term among schizophrenic outpatient chronic schizophrenia .
DOC.brief_title: Lurasidone HCl - A Long Term Phase 3 Study Patients With Chronic Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Entry Criteria : Screening present study take place subject ' participation Study D1050233 complete , provide informed consent . Completed required assessment final study visit Study D1050233 . Suitable treatment outpatient set . Any chronic organic disease CNS ( schizophrenia ) .
